flavor: “People want to know. How can I live like this? The risks? The times I've died? How can I live like this? How could I live any other way?”
name: Moon Knight
text: a good offense — Reduce the cost of Agression (red) cards you play by 1.

name: Marc Spector
text: Setup: Marc Spector begins the game with an [[identity]] stack. You are always considered to be “the Marc Spector player”. To create the Identity Stack, take the Marc Spector card and put it into play as your starting alter-ego card. Then, take the remaining four of Moon Knight’s cards with the [[IDENTITY]] trait (Steven Grant, Jake Lockley, Mr. Knight, and Moon Knight), and set them in a facedown stack outside the play area. During the game, when you would usually flip your identity card to change form, choose any card from the Identity Stack to replace your active identity card with instead. Discard the active card you are changing from onto a special discard pile out of play that belongs to the Identity Stack, then put the desired identity card you have selected into play as your new active identity. You may not change your form to a card that is in this special discard pile. At the end of the player phase, place all cards in the special discard pile back into the Identity Stack. Cheap Shots — Use all aspects instead of one during deck building. You cannot include cards with printed cost of 3 or more, and must include at least 4 cards of each aspect.

name: Mr. Knight
text: The best defense — Reduce the cost of Protection (green) cards you play by 1.

flavor: “Moon Knight is a third-rate caracter at best. And people are tired of super hero movies.”
name: Steven Grant
text: CEO — Reduce the cost of Leadership (blue) cards you play by 1.

name: Jake Lockley
text: Just 'Cause — Reduce the cost of Justice (yellow) cards you play by 1.

flavor: “Echo, She can duplicate anything she sees, perfectly.” - Daredevil
name: Echo
text: [star] Echo gets THW and ATK equal to your active hero's THW and ATK. If you are in alter-ego form, Echo cannot atttack or thwart

name: Khonshu
text: Action: Exhaust Konshu → change your form to Moon Knight. Response: After you change form, exhaust Khonshu → draw a card.

name: Frenchie
text: Interrupt: Wen any amount of treat would be placed on the main scheme, discard Frenchie → prevent all that threat.

name: Different Folks
text: After you change form, place a madness counter here. hero Action Remove 6 madness counters from Different Folks → stun an enemy.

name: Different Strokes
text: Interrupt: When you play an aspect card, place a madness counter here. (limit once per round for each aspect) Action: Remove 3 madness counters from Different Strokes → ready your identity or change form. Forced Interrupt: When the player phase ends, remove all madness counters from Different Strokes.

name: Deck and Cover
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is defeated, change your form. This card is both a Moon Knight card and an aggression card).

name: Figth or Foil
text: Choose one: Action (attack): Change form to Moon Knight → deal 2 damage to an enemy. Action (attack): Change form to Mr. Knight → remove 2 threat from a scheme. This card is both a Moon Knight card and a justice card).

name: Gear Up
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you defend against an attack, you get +2 DEF and gain retaliate 2 until the of the round. After this attack is resolved, change your form. This card is both a Moon Knight card and a protection card).

name: Where 'd He Go
text: Choose one: Action: Change to hero form → confuse an enemy. Action : Change to alter-ego form → stun an enemy. This card is both a Moon Knight card and a leadership card).

name: Versality
text: Treat this card as any aspect you choose. Hero Action:if the aspect of the top on your discard pile is: . Aggression - Deal 4 damage to an enemy. . Justice - Remove 3 threat from a scheme. . Leadership - Confuse an enemy. . Protection - Stun an enemy.
